              <div class="Grid-cell">
                <div class="ProfileSidebar ProfileSidebar--withLeftAlignment">
  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/Myles3D" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Myles Stacey</a>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/Myles3D">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">Myles3D</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">From detentions &amp; failed tests at state comp in Warrington to Oxford &amp; Cambridge simultaneously. School Governor, Outreach, CPF BAME Champ, candidate <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f1ec-1f1e7.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Flag of the United Kingdom" aria-label="Emoji: Flag of the United Kingdom" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f1ef-1f1f2.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Flag of Jamaica" aria-label="Emoji: Flag of Jamaica" /></p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-locationText u-dir" dir="ltr">
              United Kingdom

        </span>
      </div>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-url  u-hidden">
        <span class="Icon Icon--url Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>

      </div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/Myles3D" data-user-id="856106984273268736">

  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Money from <a href="/DFID_UK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="19915362"><s>@</s><b>DFID_UK</b></a> for Water Supply and Sanitation Projects since 2010 - making a difference to lives across the globe  <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f30d.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Globe showing Europe and Africa" aria-label="Emoji: Globe showing Europe and Africa" /> <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f6b0.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Potable water symbol" aria-label="Emoji: Potable water symbol" />

2011 - 109.7m 
2012 - 106.7m
2013 - 128.3m

    </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">"Commonwealth has key role to play in the bright future for Britain."

On <a href="/hashtag/CommonwealthDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CommonwealthDay</b></a> Foreign Secretary <a href="/BorisJohnson" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3131144855"><s>@</s><b>BorisJohnson</b></a> looks ahead to April's Summit.

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Happy <a href="/hashtag/CommonwealthDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CommonwealthDay</b></a> 

The Commonwealth encompasses some of the largest and smallest, most developed and least developed countries in the world.

We share a longstanding bond and an exciting future. <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f1f8-1f1f1.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Flag of Sierra Leone" aria-label="Emoji: Flag of Sierra Leone" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f1ec-1f1e7.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Flag of the United Kingdom" aria-label="Emoji: Flag of the United Kingdom" /><a href="/commonwealthsec" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="30848629"><s>@</s><b>commonwealthsec</b></a></p>

  <div class="dismissed-module">
    <div class="feedback-actions">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Not many better ways to start <a href="/hashtag/StDavidsDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StDavidsDay</b></a> to be fair <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f600.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Grinning face" aria-label="Emoji: Grinning face" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f44d.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Thumbs up sign" aria-label="Emoji: Thumbs up sign" />. Best wishes to to everyone celebrating today, with or without the snowballs. <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2744.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Snowflake" aria-label="Emoji: Snowflake" /><a href="https://t.co/FEDhlqX8YP" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/bbcradio4/status/969097619418107905" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/bbcradio4/status/969097619418107905"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/bbcradio4/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/969097619418107905</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Raised the need for earlier detection &amp; diagnosis of <a href="/hashtag/lungcancer?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>lungcancer</b></a> with the Prime Minister during <a href="/hashtag/PMQs?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PMQs</b></a> and the need to break the stigma linked to the disease.  Really touched by the warmth of the reception I received from all sides of the House of Commons.<a href="https://t.co/kslxHOQix3" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/kslxHOQix3</a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Now that Labour have Munroe Bergdorf as an equalities advisor, perhaps she can advise Jeremy Corbyn as to the best way to reply to my letter about racism in the Labour Party. 

Ive still not had a response from him.<a href="https://t.co/zH8VhLGK2Z" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jamescleverly/status/930459500427075584" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jamescleverly/status/930459500427075584"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jamescleverly/</span><span class="invisible">status/930459500427075584</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">James Cleverly added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/JamesCleverly/status/930459500427075584" data-conversation-id="930459500427075584" aria-hidden="true">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Last night Kingston's Conservative Council
Froze Council Tax <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2744.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Snowflake" aria-label="Emoji: Snowflake" />
Invested 1.5m into repairing Roads <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f6e3.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Motorway" aria-label="Emoji: Motorway" />
Invested 1m into Parks and Pavements <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f333.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Deciduous tree" aria-label="Emoji: Deciduous tree" />
Investing 500k in Libraries <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f4da.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Books" aria-label="Emoji: Books" />
Saw record increased levels of Recycling <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/267b.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Universal recycling symbol" aria-label="Emoji: Universal recycling symbol" />
Took our savings to 54m in 4 years <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2702.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Scissors" aria-label="Emoji: Scissors" /></p>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Its 50 days to go until <a href="/hashtag/CHOGM2018?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CHOGM2018</b></a> when <a href="/hashtag/Commonwealth?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Commonwealth</b></a> leaders, foreign ministers and representatives from the worlds of business, civil society &amp; youth organisations will gather in London to work towards a common future

More info <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/27a1.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Right-pointing arrow" aria-label="Emoji: Right-pointing arrow" />  <a href="https://t.co/dswTB452l3" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.chogm2018.org.uk" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.chogm2018.org.uk"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">chogm2018.org.uk</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">25 years ago today, footballing legend Bobby Moore died of bowel cancer. This year also commemorates the founding of the <a href="/BobbyMooreFund" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="52358883"><s>@</s><b>BobbyMooreFund</b></a>. Thanks to research, almost 6 out of 10 people diagnosed with bowel cancer now survive the disease for at least 10 years.<a href="https://t.co/EXTbgM2pUO" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/EXTbgM2pUO</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Team GB <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f1ec-1f1e7.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Flag of the United Kingdom" aria-label="Emoji: Flag of the United Kingdom" /> have hit their pre-Olympics target with the highest ever medal haul at a Winter Olympics! Great to see National Lottery support helping British sport hit new heights. Congrats Billy Morgan &amp; the team <a href="/hashtag/PyeongChang2018?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PyeongChang2018</b></a></p>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">It was lovely to spend time with <a href="/TessaJowell" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="50303152"><s>@</s><b>TessaJowell</b></a> and her family, talking with <a href="/Jeremy_Hunt" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="112398730"><s>@</s><b>Jeremy_Hunt</b></a> about working with <a href="/CR_UK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20693661"><s>@</s><b>CR_UK</b></a> to provide a 45 million boost to brain tumour research to tackle a disease where survival remains woefully low. She truly is an inspiration to us all.<a href="https://t.co/ys2nkKmn0M" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ys2nkKmn0M</a></p>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">13</span>

  </button>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">17 February 1941 | Franciscan Fr. Maximilian Kolbe was arrested by Germans in Niepokalanw. He was first sent to Pawiak prison in Warsaw and then to Auschwitz, where he finally sacrificed his life - volunteered to replace another prisoner sentenced to starvation death.<a href="https://t.co/c8CNOG7DfX" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/c8CNOG7DfX</a></p>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       has-cards             <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Thank you <a href="/mercurechester" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="473871299"><s>@</s><b>mercurechester</b></a> for hosting the 6th <a href="/hashtag/Cheshire?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Cheshire</b></a> and <a href="/hashtag/Wirral?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Wirral</b></a> Area Dinner &amp; Conference <a href="/hashtag/CW18?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CW18</b></a> with the Home Secretary, Amber Rudd and many other distinguished guests including MPs <a href="/patel4witham" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="61660254"><s>@</s><b>patel4witham</b></a> <a href="/damienmooremp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2902135256"><s>@</s><b>damienmooremp</b></a> <a href="/DavidRutley" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="606306570"><s>@</s><b>DavidRutley</b></a> <a href="/CGreenUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1305528373"><s>@</s><b>CGreenUK</b></a> and MEPs <a href="/jfostermep" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="48507794"><s>@</s><b>jfostermep</b></a> <a href="/SHKMEP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="192993369"><s>@</s><b>SHKMEP</b></a>.           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Lord AhmadofWimbledon Retweeted Foreign Office <span class="Emoji Emoji--forLinks" style="background-image:url('https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f1ec-1f1e7.png')" title="Flag of the United Kingdom" aria-label="Emoji: Flag of the United Kingdom"></span><span class="visuallyhidden" aria-hidden="true"></span></p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">In celebrating the progress of women in the last 100 years there remains so much more to do. <a href="/foreignoffice" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14353202"><s>@</s><b>foreignoffice</b></a> we are putting girls &amp; womens education &amp; empowerment at the heart of British foreign policy<a href="https://t.co/Gf2JbAUPuR" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/foreignoffice/status/960787534329663490" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/foreignoffice/status/960787534329663490"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/foreignoffice/</span><span class="invisible">status/960787534329663490</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Holocaust Memorial Day Trust Retweeted 5News</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">We went with survivors of the Holocaust Martin Stern MBE and Susan Pollack MBE to a school in London, to talk about <a href="/hashtag/HolocaustMemorialDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>HolocaustMemorialDay</b></a><a href="https://t.co/k2NXRRkEyp" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/5_News/status/957176361310814208" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/5_News/status/957176361310814208"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/5_News/status/</span><span class="invisible">957176361310814208</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Holocaust Memorial Day Trust added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/5_News/status/957176361310814208" data-conversation-id="957176361310814208" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="957176361310814208" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="5_News" data-user-id="354267800" href="/5_News/status/957176361310814208" data-conversation-id="957176361310814208" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">

  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">5News</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>5_News</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">These Holocaust survivors were school children when taken to concentration camps - now they share their harrowing stories with todays pupils to ensure that the history they lived is never forgotten or repeated.

</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Auschwitz Memorial Retweeted Holocaust Memorial Day Trust</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">It's so importnat to remember that genocide start with words, language of ideologies of hatred &amp; prejudice, poisoning minds of people and dehumanising 'enemies'.<a href="https://t.co/d73wFEhB81" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/HMD_UK/status/956791322685325314" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/HMD_UK/status/956791322685325314"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/HMD_UK/status/</span><span class="invisible">956791322685325314</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Auschwitz Memorial added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/HMD_UK/status/956791322685325314" data-conversation-id="956791322685325314" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="956791322685325314" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="HMD_UK" data-user-id="51076040" href="/HMD_UK/status/956791322685325314" data-conversation-id="956791322685325314" tabindex="0">

  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">27 January is Holocaust Memorial Day. We invited people to witness powerful words and captured their reactions.
Watch and share for <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>HolocaustMemorialDay</b></span> 2018. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/N94f3fhCYl</span></div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today is Holocaust Memorial Day where we commit to remembering the victims of the Holocaust as well as challenging antisemitism, prejudice and bigotry in all its forms. It is vital that we continue to educate young people about the Holocaust and its contemporary relevance.<a href="https://t.co/po1E4QR7gb" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/po1E4QR7gb</a></p>
</div>

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">

</div>

  </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and critically. Intelligence plus character - that is the goal of true education. One of my favourite quotes from Martin Luther King Jr and very apt in my new role. Wishing everyone in the US a restful <a href="/hashtag/MLKDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>MLKDay</b></a></p>

        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>

  </button>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">

</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Fuelled by mince pies, I reached the Cheshire countryside on my annual Boxing Day jog! </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Grt to introduce <a href="/Myles3D" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="856106984273268736"><s>@</s><b>Myles3D</b></a> as our new <a href="/ConservativePF" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="320780137"><s>@</s><b>ConservativePF</b></a> *Shaping Tomorrow* <a href="/hashtag/CPFChampion?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CPFChampion</b></a> for the <a href="/hashtag/BAME?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BAME</b></a> community last night <a href="/CFOBUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="960320125"><s>@</s><b>CFOBUK</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/ToryRenewal?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ToryRenewal</b></a><a href="https://t.co/prXf7JLNfp" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/myles3d/status/919656491224838144" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/myles3d/status/919656491224838144"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/myles3d/status</span><span class="invisible">/919656491224838144</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Will Quince MP Retweeted Reuters Top News</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I am pleased that there will be a debate in <a href="/UKParliament" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="6467332"><s>@</s><b>UKParliament</b></a> tomorrow to discuss this important issue <a href="/hashtag/RohingyaCrisis?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RohingyaCrisis</b></a><a href="https://t.co/Y1GyGWUNQR" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/reuters/status/919791150113939456" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/reuters/status/919791150113939456"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/reuters/status</span><span class="invisible">/919791150113939456</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Will Quince MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="918623522339065857" id="stream-item-tweet-918623522339065857" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;918623522339065857&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Myles Stacey Retweeted EY Press UK</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">What a huge week for ethnic diversity - a great effort from the <a href="/hashtag/ParkerReview?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ParkerReview</b></a> to increase awareness.<a href="https://t.co/b1hPn3Xy6r" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/EY_PressUK/status/918405741685493762" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/EY_PressUK/status/918405741685493762"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/EY_PressUK/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/918405741685493762</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">It's out in the open today. Plenty of what many of us have felt &amp; seen, published. </div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="916999967633440768" id="stream-item-tweet-916999967633440768" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;916999967633440768&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">
    


  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="916999967633440768" data-item-id="916999967633440768" data-permalink-path="/Myles3D/status/916999967633440768" data-conversation-id="916999967633440768" data-tweet-nonce="916999967633440768-b7f6a1f2-efaf-4e7f-8b2d-e2a378d4f848" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="Myles3D" data-name="Myles Stacey" data-user-id="856106984273268736" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;856106984273268736&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;Myles3D&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Myles Stacey&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Myles Stacey&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Myles Stacey&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/Myles3D" data-user-id="856106984273268736">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/861976470037680128/cYI5Tfgd_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

      <div class="modal-header">

  </div>
</div>

    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
